official_title: To require the Army Corps of Engineers to perform necessary channel modifications on the lower Cumberland River in the State of Kentucky.

summary.text: Requires the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to make certain channel modifications on the lower Cumberland River in Kentucky to eliminate safety hazards to commercial navigation.

titles.title: To require the Army Corps of Engineers to perform necessary channel modifications on the lower Cumberland River in the State of Kentucky.
